title: Grateful Dead Live at Boston Garden on 1980-05-12
lineage: MAC > Re-shelled > Nakamichi DR-8 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 Tagged.
source: 2x Nakamichi CM300/CP1's > Sony TC-153SD > Maxell XLII's. Mics on stand, set up in center of upper balcony behind the stage, mics pointed at rear-facing P.A.
